title: Cisco’s Polish Solar Deal Adds New Dimension To ESG And Growth Story
title_zh: 思科的波兰太阳能交易为 ESG 和增长故事增添了新的维度
summary: Cisco Systems (NasdaqGS:CSCO) has entered a 15 year virtual power purchase agreement tied to four new solar projects in Poland. The deal supports additional renewable energy capacity in one of Europe’s more carbon intensive grids.
summary_zh: 思科系统公司（NasdaqGS：CSCO）已与波兰的四个新太阳能项目签订为期 15 年的虚拟电力购买协议。该协议支持欧洲碳密集度较高的电网之一增加可再生能源容量。

title: JPMorgan Deepens Retirement Push With Trump Accounts Match And WealthOS Deal
title_zh: 摩根大通通过特朗普账户匹配和WealthOS交易加深退休推动
summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) plans to match U.S. government contributions to new Trump Accounts for eligible employees' children, alongside Bank of America.
summary_zh: 摩根大通（纽约证券交易所股票代码：JPM）计划与美国银行一起，为符合条件的员工子女提供美国政府对新特朗普账户的捐款。

title: Nvidia Just Dealt a Devastating Blow To Intel. Here's What It Means for Investors.
title_zh: 英伟达刚刚对英特尔造成了毁灭性的打击。这对投资者意味着什么。
summary: Nvidia tested Intel's 18A process, but decided not to use it.
summary_zh: Nvidia测试了Intel的18A工艺，但决定不使用它。

title: BlackRock, Morgan Stanley, and Partners Group Team Up on New Alts Offering
title_zh: 贝莱德、摩根士丹利和合众集团联手推出新的替代产品
summary: The new separately managed accounts are oriented around specific goals and include seven underlying private funds.
summary_zh: 新的独立管理账户以特定目标为导向，包括七只基础私募基金。

title: KKR enters $1.4bn deal to sell Goodpack stake back to founding family – report
title_zh: KKR 达成 14 亿美元协议，将 Goodpack 股份出售给创始家族 - 报告
summary: KKR’s decision to divest comes after it explored options for selling the reusable bulk container provider in October 2024.
summary_zh: KKR 在探索 2024 年 10 月出售这家可重复使用散装集装箱供应商的选择后，做出了剥离的决定。
